title: [1.8+]一种生成“蚯蚓”的方法= =
author: 白天
txt_content:
今天咱在做一件作品的时候本来想要做到丢出去几样东西后执行命令 本来想弄个“无序合成”
但是没有成功，大家可以看看有什么错误指出来/scoreboard objectives add wujoshoyo dummy  /scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] wujoshoyo 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:crafting_table"}} /scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] wujoshoyo 2 {Item:{id:"minecraft:furnace"}} /scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] wujoshoyo 3 {Item:{id:"minecraft:wooden_shovel"}}  /execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=1,score_wujoshoyo_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=2,score_wujoshoyo_min=2,r=1,c=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=3,score_wujoshoyo_min=3,r=1,c=1] ~ ~ ~ summon WitherSkull ~ ~ ~ {direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:0,CustomName:"wujoshoyo",CustomNameVisible:false}  /execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=1,score_wujoshoyo_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=2,score_wujoshoyo_min=2,r=1,c=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=3,score_wujoshoyo_min=3,r=1,c=1] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[type=Item,r=3]  /execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=2,r=1,c=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=3,r=1,c=1] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:sandstone  /execute @e[type=WitherSkull,name=wujoshoyo] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ minecraft:air kill @e[type=WitherSkull,name=wujoshoyo,r=1,c=1]
当我丢出去工作台时 他就会自己生成一条蚯蚓= =
效果：

这是在错误之中发现的。。。
实际上很简单 就几条命令
/scoreboard objectives add wujoshoyo dummy
复制代码创建个计分板
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] wujoshoyo 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:crafting_table"}}复制代码给工作台加分
/execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=1] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:sandstone
复制代码再setblock。。。 后面的minecraft:sandstone随便改
实际上就是让方块挤开工作台 再放置方块
然而这并不是我要达到的效果= = 急死了


这里给个OOC 可以直接体验一下。。。丢个工作台就可以
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-17 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-12 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-10 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-9 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-8 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-7 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Item,score_wujoshoyo=1] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:sandstone"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-6 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] wujoshoyo 1 {Item:{id:\\"minecraft:crafting_table\\"}}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-5 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add wujoshoyo dummy"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-4 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-3 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-2 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~0 ~5 ~4 ~0 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~21 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
虽然没什么意义。。。只是要问问大家怎么才能做到那个无序合成。。。

replies.txt_content:
懂了，就是不断在掉落物上放方块，从而使物品被挤开，然后不断重复，从而实现生成一只蚯蚓的对吧233，关于怎样做到无序合成，举个栗子——按顺序执行：
/scoreboard objectives add test dummy复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] test 1 {OnGround:1b,Item:{id:"minecraft:apple"}}复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] test 2 {OnGround:1b,Item:{id:"minecraft:egg"}}复制代码/execute @e[type=Item,score_test_min=1,score_test=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[type=Item,score_test_min=2,score_test=2,r=0] ~ ~ ~ /give @p minecraft:stone 1 0复制代码/execute @e[type=Item,score_test_min=1,score_test=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[type=Item,score_test_min=2,score_test=2,r=0] ~ ~ ~ /kill @e[type=Item,r=0,score_test_min=2]复制代码
当一个苹果和一个鸡蛋重叠时，就会给玩家一个石头

replies.txt_content:
2362577123 发表于 2015-11-15 22:19
懂了，就是不断在掉落物上放方块，从而使物品被挤开，然后不断重复，从而实现生成一只蚯蚓的对吧233，关于 ...
感谢233
作品终于有着落了233

replies.author: guaiwanji
replies.txt_content: 不错额，我打算根据这个原理做一个“追逐工作台”的游戏，不知LZ允许我开学后把它发到MCBBS上吗？
